org.fujion.component

Class BaseInputComponent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.component.BaseInputComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the input value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseInputboxComponent, CodeMirror

    public abstract class BaseInputComponent<T>
extends BaseUIComponent
    The base class for all components that support some mode of character-based user input.

      • _getValue

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="value")
protected String _getValue()
        Returns the input value as a string. Uses the _toString method to do the conversion.
        Returns:
        The input value as a string.

      • _setValue

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="value")
protected void _setValue(String value)
        Sets the input value as a string. Uses the _toValue method to do the conversion.
        Parameters:
        value - The input value as a string.

      • _setValue

        protected void _setValue(T value,
                         boolean notifyClient)
        Sets the input value.
        Parameters:
        value - The input value.
        notifyClient - If true, notify the client of the change.

      • _toValue

        protected abstract T _toValue(String value)
        Converts a string value to this component's value type.
        Parameters:
        value - String value to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted value.

      • _toString

        protected abstract String _toString(T value)
        Converts a value to a string.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted value.

      • _toClient

        protected Object _toClient(T value)
        Override to provide alternate serialization format for sending to client. Default action is to serialize to string.
        Parameters:
        value - The raw value.
        Returns:
        The serialized value.

      • _onChange

        @EventHandler(value="change",
              syncToClient=false)
protected void _onChange(ChangeEvent event)
        Event handler for change events sent by the client.
        Parameters:
        event - The change event.
